snippet: Military officials said they had seen nothing to indicate that Specialist Ivan Antonio Lopez was previously violent or suicidal.
abstract: Military officials say Fort Hood gunman Specialist Ivan Lopez was being evaluated for possible post-traumatic stress disorder, but that they had seen nothing to indicate that he was previously violent or suicidal; Lopez served in Iraq in 2011 but did not see combat.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Elivan Martinez, Eric Schmitt, Michael S. Schmidt, Dave Montgomery, Timothy Williams, Jennifer Preston, Erica Goode, Jack Begg and Jacqueline Baylon.

lead_paragraph: Military officials said they had seen nothing to indicate that Specialist Ivan Antonio Lopez was previously violent or suicidal.

headline.main: Gunman Had ‘Clean Record,’ With No Violent Sign, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Gunman Had ‘Clean Record,’ With No Violent Sign, Officials Say

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
